title: Why are scooters without license plates allowed on 421 with the speed limit up to 55 mph?  This is so dangerous in the day time with all the traffic and really bad at nights.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. In short, because it's legal for them to be on the road according to state law. http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20080214/NEWS/802140421
